title: Hour 1: What Do You Think, Big Fella?
description:
Greg actually has his Back In My Day on a Greg Cote Tuesday! Then, will an expanded College Football Playoff ruin games like Tennessee-Alabama? And is there a conspiracy afoot with Yankees-Guardians? Plus, some more Charles Barkley contract talk leads us to predicting the future of Inside the NBA.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
